default_target_id.description: The ID of the target that should be used as a fallback destination for calls if the call router is disabled or fails.

default_target_type.description: The entity type of the default target.

enabled.description: If set to False, the call router will skip the routing url and instead forward calls straight to the default target.

name.description:
[single-line only]

A human-readable display name for the router.

office_id.description: The ID of the office to which this router belongs.

routing_url.description: The URL that should be used to drive call routing decisions.

secret.description:
[single-line only]

The call router's signature secret. This is a plain text string that you should generate with a minimum length of 32 characters.
